product1.name: Abhay Tablet
product1.orderText: To order the product or to know visit the nearest Shri Sadanand Aushadhi Upalabdhi kendra. Click Below.

indication.name: Indication:
indication.line3: Safe and Effective for Pregnant Woman.

ingridents.name: Ingredients : Each bottle contains:
ingridents.text: Adulaa Lf. (Adhatoda Vasica Lf.) 1 gm., Aak Lf. (Calatropis Gigantea Lf.) 1 gm., Neem Lf. (Azadicachta Indic: Lf.) 1 gm., TuIsi Lt. (Ocimurn Sanctum : Lf.) 1 gm.,Amba Lt. (Mangifera Indica : Lf.) 1 gm.,Pangla Lf.(Pogostemom Persiflams Lf.) 1 gm., Bel Lf. (Aegis Marmalos Fmetus Lf.) 1 gm., Seesam Lf. (Black Woodif.) 1 gm., Arnruta St. Tinospora Cardifolia : St) 4 gms., Bleck Pepper Fr. (Piper Nigrum :Fr) 100 mg, Delchini bk. (Ginnamomum Cassia : st. bk.) 100 mg, Gur (Jaggery) 4 ml, Pudina Photo (Menthe Spicata )0S, APvain sat (Trachyspermum Amml lien ) 55, Kapur(131yobalacbs Camphora QS

dosage.name: Dosage:
dosage.line1: Infants: Half tsp. twice a day on empty stomach,
dosage.line2: Children: 1 tsp. twice a day on empty stomach,
dosage.line3: Adults: 2 tsp. twice a day on empty stomach or as directed by physician.

note.name: Note—
note.text: eating anything for 2 hours before and after consumption of Gurjo Kadha

product5.name: Sadanand-P Churna
product5.translation: अश्वगंधा, गवती चहा, आलं, वेलची, लवंग, काळी मिरी,अर्जुन आणि जायफळचा आयुर्वेदिक गुणकारी काढा
product5.orderText: ऑर्डर करण्यासाठी किंवा तुमच्या शहरातील श्री सदानंद औषधी उपलब्धी केंद्राच्या माहितीसाठी क्लिक करा.

indication.name: Indication:
indication.line3: Beneficial to improve the eyesight, improves kidneys function better. Improve respiration and blood circulation. All this in turn will help you stay active throughout the day and improves sleep at night. Useful for all age group throughout the year.

ingridents.name: Ingredients : Each bottle contains 1gm:
ingridents.text: Black pepper Fr. (Piper Nigrum : Fr.) 10 mg, Ashwagandha Rt. (Withania somnifera :Rt.) 200 mg, Chhoti elaichi sd. (Elettaria Cardamomum : sd.) 5 mg, Jaipal suddha sd. (Croton Tiglium : sd.) 5 mg, Adrak Rz. (Zingiber Officibale : Rz) 20 mg, Lavang churna (Syzygium Aromaticum : powder) 5 mg, Kankol / Kabab Chini Churna (Piper Cubeba : churna) 5 mg, Taravad Fl. (Cassia Auriculata : FL)400 mg, Arjun Bk. (Terminalia Arjuna : Bk.) 150 mg, Gavathi chai Lf. (Cymbopogon Flexuosus : Lf.) 200 mg, Preservative - QS

dosage.name: Dosage:
dosage.line1: Add 1 teaspoon in 2 cups of water or milk and boil.,
dosage.line2: Add jaggery/ sugar as perthe taste or as directed by physician.,

note.name: Note—
note.text: eating anything for 2 hours before and after consumption of Gurjo Kadha

product6.name: Shri Govind Oil
product6.translation: गुणकारी पुदीना, ओवा आणि कापूर चे प्रभावी तेल
product6.orderText: To order the product or get delivered in your area please check the nearest Shri Sadanand Vanaspati Upalabdhi kendra. Click Here.

indication.name: Indication:
indication.line1: Beneficial in Gastric disorder & Kapha Roga.

ingridents.name: Ingredients : Each 50 ml oil contains :
ingridents.text: Pudina Phool (Mentha spicata) 20 gm wain sat (Trachyspennum ammi Linn) 15 gm Kanpur (Dryobalaobs camphora) 15 gm

dosage.name: Dosage:
dosage.line1: 3-5 drops of Oil to be mixed with 30 ml of warm water & taken thrice daily for Gastric Problems.
dosage.line2: For Nasal Blockage, put 3-5 drops of Oil in boiled water & vapour inhaled thrice a day or as directed by physician.

note.name: Note—
note.text: eating anything for 2 hours before and after consumption of Gurjo Kadha

about.title: ABOUT SHRI SADANAND
about.description1: Where flowers are our inspiration to create lasting memories. Whatever the occasion inspiration to create lasting memories.
about.description2: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Atque non veniam tempore nemo doloribus mollitia magnam similique ratione! Incidunt possimus magni ullam, distinctio nesciunt voluptates commodi dolor ipsa voluptate atque

aboutpage.para1: In the land sanctified by the touch of Swami Shri Mahadev and Shri Bhagwan Parashuram of Trilokya, i.e. Shri Kshetra Tungareshwar, Shri Balayogi Sadanand Maharaj's yoga practice and his long practice of Ayurveda for the last 48 years have produced various medicines for various ailments and diseases.
aboutpage.para2: Cherishing the legacy of Shri Sant Shrestha Dnyaneshwar Mauli, who nurtured the concept of ‘हे विश्वची माझे घर’ (‘This is my home of the world’), Maharaj is doing good deeds with the pure intention of social welfare in mind by producing medicines for the welfare of all the world by emphasizing on spirituality and medicine.
aboutpage.para3: For the manufacture of these medicines, ‘Nityanand Pharmacy’ i.e. Balayogi Shri Sadanand Maharaj Siddha Vanaspati Upchar Kendra Sanstha has been established and the work of social welfare has started with the approval of Food and Drug Administration (FDA) in the name of this organization. The medical system is also deployed for the purpose of treating this function with drugs. This organization has been working under the guidance of Baba for the last several years.
aboutpage.para4: The organization is providing medical treatment to many needy victims in the area. Maharaj's interest in Ayurveda, curiosity and great penance and study of Ayurveda texts i.e. Ashtanga Hridaya, Ashtanga Sangraha, Shushrut Samhita, Charak Samhita and similar texts were the source of medicine. Maharaj has a deep study of the plants in the Tungareshwar area. During the last 48 years, Maharaj has been working for the treatment of various diseases. ‘जन सेवा हिच ईश्वर सेवा’ (‘Public service is God's service’) is the motto of Maharaj. Nityanand Pharmacy is treating people from all walks of life. With the blessings and medicine of Maharaj, many people today have been cured of various ailments.
